data.title: test_hello
data.description: A test library that holds a single `run_tool` function (created from an attribute macro). Returns "Hello" followed by whatever string you put into it.

data.title: test_fetch
data.description: A test library that holds a single `run_tool` function (created from an attribute macro). Executes a POST request, then returns the results.

data.title: test_read_file
data.description: A test library that tries to read whatever file location you give it (if you don't know what to use, use "Cargo.toml".

data.title: test_read_dir
data.description: A test library that tries to read whatever directory you give it (if you don't know what to use, use ".".

data.title: test_read_file
data.description: A test library that tries to write a provided string to whatever directory file path you give it.
